website_summaries.verdict: An ideal addition to your workout, especially for those on the move and also on a budget.
pros: Customers appreciate the set is designed to minimize noise, making them ideal for at-home workouts
Ideal for those dedicated to daily workouts and in need of equipment that can stand the test of time and usage
A perfect set for those new to weight training
cons: It would be in your best interest to invest in a pair of weight gloves, as the handles can be rough to the touch

website_summaries.verdict: It's hard to find another set of adjustable dumbbells that offers the same amount of adjustability and performance for the price.
pros: Caters to athletes of all abilities with a variety of plate weights along with dumbbells that set up to match various weight preferences
cons: Rare complaints of a strong chemical odor which often lingers on hands after use

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: My carrying case came in perfect shape. I didn't get any funky smell with my set. There are no clunky noises when using these weights because there are rubber washers for both sides of the weights. They're a good quality set, especially for the price. The product looks exactly as advertised. I'm probably going to end up buying gloves because I'm used to covered weights. I would recommend this set for anyone who is working on low weight, high rep type exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Kae Luh

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!  SPLINTERS OF METAL in my hands after holding it  for 20 seconds. Cancer warning too
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it! SPLINTERS OF METAL in my hands after holding it for 20 seconds. Cancer warning too This is the only reason I’m saying NO to this product!
customer_reviews.author: Yatinkumar

customer_reviews.title: Good workout: some smell
customer_reviews.text: I just did my first workout with the dumbbells and I like them. Ever since my first set of dumbbells that had them, I have liked the spin lock mechanism for securing the weights. Nice case, too. I will have to buy a couple separate 10 lb plates so that I can go beyond the approximately 40 lbs per dumbbell, but it's not like that was something wrong with the product I bought. There is the problem of the smell that many people mentioned. I did my first workout in my own bedroom, and my son - from another room - came in to ask what the funky smell was. Hopefully it diminishes over time.
customer_reviews.author: DNAunion

customer_reviews.title: Cheap - odd smell - dirty case - gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: One thing I'm concerned with is getting some sort of metal micro splinter from these handles... they seem very "unattended" I can't think of a better word at the moment. But they don't seem like they were given much care. The plastic container they came in was extremely dirty and I had to wash it off. The contents have a very odd smell. There are many metal flakes coming off of the fasteners and handles. I'm definitely concerned about metal flakes coming off and being left on the ground. The cheap price is 100% reflected by the cheapness of the product.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: These work well, great quality for such a low price. My only issue is that the end pieces that are supposed to hold the plates on come loose extremely easily. Typically by the time I'm finishing a set, the plates are rattling because the screw pieces have come undone and they're falling off. I am constantly having to tighten them again and again, sometimes stopping mid-set, so that the plates don't fly off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still in great shape after nine yrs of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these weights in 2010. I still use them. They look exactly like the way we’re the day I received them (it’s now May 2019). That’s pretty awesome. I don’t know how many other products look almost new (if not new) after almost a decade. These really good quality. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: lasniteTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: A pretty good value for a basic dumbbell set
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of these that I've purchased. I just wanted something simple. I think my first set (that I bought several years ago) is a little better quality than the second. With the second set, the rubber pieces that help keep the ends from coming loose are pretty worthless and the weights do get loose more than my first set. Still, not a bad deal for 40lbs shipped to your door, and maybe I just got a mediocre set (or maybe they've cut some costs recently...).
customer_reviews.author: 07MINI

customer_reviews.title: Perfect & simple for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for me. I just started doing at home weights/working out and I wanted something simple and compact. They can go up to 20 lbs each or you could load one bar with more weight and use one at a time. The only "issue" I have had is one of the little rubber pieces in the part that holds the weight in place fell out when taking it off, but it's super easy to just pop it back in - it doesn't change the integrity of the dumbbell while using it (it's still safe to use).
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: THESE DUMBBELLS DON'T WEIGH 40 LBS. THEY WEIGH 37 LBS!
customer_reviews.text: I weighed these dumbbells on the scale and they don't weigh the advertised weight. To equal 40 lbs, the bar's themselves would have to weigh 5 lbs each and they only weigh 3.5 lbs. I contacted CAP about it and they made up some BS about "calibration and variations between scales." That doesn't account for 3 whole pounds though. Other than that, I like the dumbbells and still use them. Just annoyed at the false advertising and being totally blown off by the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Very solid weight set for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid weight set. I like that you can expand it more over time. You can purchase additional weights for it. Comes with a decent case to store the items. It’s plastic but sufficient. Why 4 stars? My only compliant is that the coating comes off at first use: doesn’t mean it will stop being good or anything. I just wish that you would get better quality outer materials. Overall a quality deal. 4 stars because of the initial shedding of of the coating. Like I’ve said, not a deal breaker of course.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Good dumbbell set with one flaw
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent dumbbell set. It comes with a case for all your stuff so the storage is clean. It's also a plus that you can put all the weight into a single bar. The grip is also good. Overall it's a decent set but there is one thing that made me not like this set. The rubber collar that the product so proudly lists on its product info pops out for each use. It's a snug fit but it pops out once in awhile and I have to manually put it back in each time. Without it, the star collars gets loose which can get annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel ParkTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: You buy something for some reasons and you have a set of requirements for the product to meet. These adjustable dumbbells have good value for your $$. Its brand new so long term use is still in the offing. My requirements have been met: being adjustable, with desired weights and aesthetically good enough. The carrying or storage case is an extra. The handles are a little thin for my grip but wearing exercise gloves (as in lifting weights) makes it perfect. There is a slight smell but it's not overpowering and so after I used them I put the disassembled parts out to be aerated. Over all it's a good buy and you can't be finicky for it's price.
customer_reviews.author: JUN MAGLANOC

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap (in price) but apparently in quality also. They aren't bad for a starter set, just make sure you wear gloves. I've gotten so many metal splinters from these things it's ridiculous. I think it comes from the screw on stoppers. If you're desperate for a decent, basic starting set, maybe just plan on replacing the stoppers or wearing good gloves to cope with the metal shards.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: The add is deceptive.
customer_reviews.text: The add is DECEPTIVE 7 UNTRUE. the bar and collars weigh 3.5 pounds each, the 4 plates weigh5 pounds each are and 4 plates weigh 2.5 pounds each. The total weight per dumbbell is 18.5 pounds including bar and collar. Total weight 37 pounds, but it's advertised as 40 pounds. Three pounds isn't much unless you are recovering from shoulder surgery. Amazon correctly reported the weight. I learned after receiving my order. They tell the truth the product Cap DECEPTIVE ADVERTISING
customer_reviews.author: Jody Humber

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Store and Use; Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Got these to work out during quarantine. I don’t like these types of weights because the ring holder always come loose when I’m using it and I don’t like having to switch weights in between (messes with my circuit), but it’s serving it’s purpose. Better than the last pair of these I got. If I had the space, I’d just get the free weight dumbell stand. However, if you’re looking for something that you can tuck under a chair or desk and pull out when you want to a quick set, these will do it.
customer_reviews.author: CristyC

customer_reviews.title: Dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: To make a 100 lbs. dumbbell, I would need the older style 10lbs black plates, which were thinner with no hand cut outs.. I can only put 3, '10'lbs. plates, "Cap Standard Grey with hand cut outs" per side safely, making roughly a 65 lbs. dumbbell. Edit, Make sure to click the 17 inch bars at bottom of listing to make up to the 100 lbs. dumbbell. In my haste, I did not.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Decent set for the price, but the chrome handles are poorly coated. I end up with chrome shards embedded in my hands, which I imagine if you had sensitive skin, would surely irritate you. Comes with the nice scent of Chinese factory grease. If you're going to get these, you want to buy some gloves, unless you have thick, rough skin, and don't mind the smell rubbing off onto your hands.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Adjustable Dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: These dumbbells are excellent! After reading some reviews about metal fragments, I wiped them all down when I received them. I did notice some small metal fragments when I did this, however, I have not seen any since. They come with a very convenient case. I have no complaints! I just purchased additional weight plates because they are not heavy enough anymore!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: the cancer-causing coating (did you read the warning?) rubs off on your hands
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately didn't notice the warning about cancer and birth defects on the Amazon page (it's basically hidden) until after I bought this. I actually figured I might use them anyway, but in addition, whatever they are coated with actually RUBS OFF ON YOUR SKIN VISIBLY. After lifting I have silver rings on my hands. They make you pay shipping on returns so it isn't worth it. Total rip-off.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Is not worth $135
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this before but gave it away to a friend, I ordered again because I knew the gym will close for the pandemic but my order was canceled 3 weeks later and is now listed at $135 I only when it was under $50. In my opinion this set is not worth all that money, so I ordered some bands while the gym reopens
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Bautista

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for exercise and light training.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for exercise and light training. Comes in a very handy carrying case. The lifting weight is not actually 40 pounds, There are 4 five pound plates, 4 two and a half pound plates and two bars which are about 2 pounds each plus 4 collars to hold the weights on the bar. Add it all up when you load all you can on one bar and it's about 35 to 37 pounds. If you do use both bars loaded up it may be 40 pounds total. However, the set is very nicely made and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Steelman

customer_reviews.title: Good product, parts missing
customer_reviews.text: Came with a damaged box and all the weights and bars were scattered outside of their designated container, also the bolts which hold the weights intact on the bar were completely missing. And calling the manufacturer doesn't work as they dont answer and their mailbox is full.
customer_reviews.author: G.Rugen

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Is as advertised. Easy to assemble and use right out of the box. I like that this is a 2 dumbbell set (which is hard to find, especially for the price). The only downside is the "40 lbs" is total, so its really 20lbs max per dumbbell. But other than that I would highly recommend this adjustable set. You can always purchase additional weights and it'll still be way cheaper than most 2 pair adjustable sets you'll find out there
customer_reviews.author: Moni Oloyede

customer_reviews.title: The weights are great! Unfortunately not for working out with this set
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? The weights are great! Unfortunately not for working out with this set. The change from one weight to another taking out the ring and putting it back on it’s a struggle and a waste of time, especially when you’re timing yourself doing Tabata or plyometrics, and even THAT is not a big deal, as when you are lifting and the rings get loose and the weights come off... Now that’s something else... that can truly throw you off from your workout mood. I wouldn’t recommend this and I wouldn’t buy it ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Parrales

customer_reviews.title: Rusted Pieces Right Out of the Box!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these less than a month and really haven't had a chance to use them, but when I finally did have time...I opened the box to discover a couple of the pieces had rusted. The screws that hold the weights together were rusted right out of the box, which is quite disappointing. These weights had a lot of potential, but the craftsmanship needed to be better!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M. Young

customer_reviews.title: Diamond grips and metal nuts, what more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.text: Great quality dumbbells! Way better than the Target or Walmart brand ones, Golds Gym or Body Fortress both use those terrible plastic nuts that tend to snap and break, these use metal nuts and the bars have diamond style grips! Now that means I'd have to recommend some lifting gloves (unless you like caleseis) but seriously these are good quality and thanks to the bar diameter I can still use the plats from my Walmart / Target sets. #doyouevenliftbro
customer_reviews.author: William A. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great set of dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid set of dumbbells for a beginner to weight training. I had previously practiced bodyweight fitness (which is a very accessible way to get into fitness). Resources like these adjustable dumbbells help make weight training more accessible to those who don't like going to the gym in the cold weather in the mornings, or those who don't live near a gym. Working out at home saves a lot of time. If you found yourself nodding your head while reading this, these dumbbells are for you. A few weeks in, you might find yourself wanting two pairs of these so you can switch exercises quicker. There is no gasoline or unpleasant smell on these dumbbells.
customer_reviews.author: Malcompliance

customer_reviews.title: Great 40lbs set with case easy to storage
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 40lbs set almost three months ago and I'm very happy with it so far. At the time it was great value for the price. The case makes it perfect to store in a closet or beneath the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for all you get. The weights came in a clever case that custom fit the weights and bars. Everything was well made. My only issue was the screw-on nuts. One seemed to have slight cross-threading issues or chafe in the threads. Had to force it a bit, but once the threads were seated everything screwed on tight. I don't need to adjust the weight - I use the 20 lb barbells all the time. For those who want to change the weight frequently, you might weary of having to screw the retainer nuts on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Paracletos

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners, high quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, easy to use, excellent beginner set. The only issue is that it doesn't add up to 40 lb as advertised. As long as you don't need it to total 40 lb, it's a great value. I appreciate that I can make my own little home gym with these. Also, I've always felt that the brightly colored, light-weight dumbbells marketed to women are condescending. These are neutral and all business, no judgments.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fandl

customer_reviews.title: Great, But Important Issue
customer_reviews.text: I've been working on an exercise routine with these for about a month, and I absolutely love them! It really is a great start to building fitness. However, sometimes while I am exercising, one of the screws that hold one side of the weights will come loose, and I will have to be quick to retighten it. I took a star off since that's a pretty bad defect IMO (obviously can be dangerous), but I doubt it's a common issue.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great set of beginner weights
customer_reviews.text: Great set of beginner weights. I got these shortly after major abdominal surgery and went from being able to just lift the 5lb bars by themselves to lifting them maxed out with the included weights. Already looking to buy more weights to add to them. Only con I've found so far is the collars come loose and have to be retightened often when being used. Would recommend these to anyone looking to get started with a beginner barbell set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price...annoying rubber o-ring
customer_reviews.text: I like these weights. They work great and have the versatility I was looking to get. However, the rubber o-ring on one dumbbell keeps falling off the nut and it delays the speed at which i can change weights. Not the end of the world, but i do find it a consistent nuisance.
customer_reviews.author: James R Williams

customer_reviews.title: 20 per dumbell not 40 per dumbell
customer_reviews.text: The products great. However I thought it was forty pounds per dumbell. It’s not. Your only getting 20 per dumbell. Not happy with that. Plates are not available to purchase neither is another set of these. Other then that they are great.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: This set is great in that it is adjustable
customer_reviews.text: This set is great in that it is adjustable, but it doesn't seem to be the best quality (but what can you expect for $50). There seem to be some rust spots on the pieces, but it doesn't render the product unusable or anything. Overall, they do get a lot of use and are really easy to hold. I find that the weights are really exact and they are balanced very well!
customer_reviews.author: Anna D

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for a few weeks now. I read previous reviews and the smell is an accurate one, so as soon as they arrived, I took them out to the yard, sprayed them with the hose and a little soap, let them dry overnight, and then brought them into my living room where I spend a fair amount of time, and where I wanted them to ultimately reside. No problems with the smell after washing them. The case seems a little plastic/weak - so I would haul with caution, but no other complaints (never had a problem swapping weights, seem to stay on tight enough not to wiggle). Nice for small hands.
customer_reviews.author: GoJo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect weight capacity
customer_reviews.text: Perfect weight capacity. Exactly just what I needed for my arms. I like the storage box very much. One negative comment with this item, I saw some rust on 1 of the bar which scares me a little bit about the durability of this product.
customer_reviews.author: jdtan14

customer_reviews.title: They honestly kind of scare me because I don’t feel like they stay tightened during use how they should
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. He’s been enjoying them thus far. They honestly kind of scare me because I don’t feel like they stay tightened during use how they should. It creeps me out lol. I was also under the impression that it would equal out to two 40 pound sets, but I guess I misunderstood. My husband just uses all 40 pounds of weights on one bar. He’s happy lol.
customer_reviews.author: TeeJay

customer_reviews.title: Spending a little more money on better
customer_reviews.text: My main concern is that these dumbbells reaks, I have tried washing it and letting it dry out but the scent doesn't go away. The title is kind of misleading, i thought they were 40lbs per dumbbell but its not. And buying additional weights don't fit it exactly and its oversize. The screws in the end of the weights to hold them in get loose by themselves and its annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Decent set of weights, wear gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Good set of adjustable weights, I just wish the nut used to keep the weights on the bars wouldn't slip so easily. I find myself having to tighten the nut every time I use the weights. The grip on bars seem to have worn away from use; I've found metal on my hands. I tend to use gloves with them now. Otherwise they work well, and are a decent price. Also easy to purchase weight plates for providing they're the same size.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great for a home gym
customer_reviews.text: These are great dumbbells for the home. I am a female and wanted ones that could be adjusted depending on what exercise I was doing. They are very easy to add/take off weight. If you keep the weights even, they only go up to 15lbs+the bar and adjusters. To get up to 40lbs, you can only use one of the dumbbells. I highly recommend. Also, I use weight gloves since the metal bar gives me calluses.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Good, easy access.
customer_reviews.text: I like the case (it's just plastic) It keep the weights from sliding around in my car/truck. Also I have easy access to the weights when I want to workout, that's good because if it's too difficult I will never exercise. Just make sure it enuff or not to much weight for you. For me it's perfect but I'm out of shape 6"2' tall. So if you only need 2 to 3 pounds this will be to havey. If you need 50 lbs plus this will be too light (unless you are using them to increase your current setup).
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: they smell like oily metal
customer_reviews.text: No weird smell, as some other reviews stated. I mean, they smell like oily metal, what do you expect! It's not overpowering, I work in the same room that I keep these dumbells and have never even noticed any smell. They are well made and the safety bolts screw on tight, machining on all the edges is good with normal die-marks, nothing cheap-feeling. They are comfortable to use, the case is awesome, and I use them all the time *flexes*. Which way is the beach?
customer_reviews.author: Matt Adamczyk

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Compact, but Not Very Versatile
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect set for me. It's a good price, and I love that it comes in a case that lets me hide the set under my couch in the living room where I use these. It probably wouldn't fit under most couches, but we have a futon that's fairly high off the ground, so it works for me. The only reason I give this 4 stars is because it only comes with (4) 2.5 weights and (4) 5 pound weights, so it's hard to get a variety of weights without unbalancing the dumbbell.
customer_reviews.author: Tati

customer_reviews.title: Nice weights, though putrid smell . . .
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value. Nice build quality, convenient packaging. The reports about the incredible stench that come off of them are true, unfortunately. I was aware of it on ordering so was prepared. As soon as I opened the box I could smell them. Gross. Immediately sprayed down the outside and inside of the case with Axe deodorant. Opened the window and put the open case next to it to air it out. I removed the rubber pieces from the weights and stops and threw the whole set (minus the rubber) into the dishwasher and ran it. Viola, no more stench!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Kou

customer_reviews.title: I use them during my work breaks.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a graphic designer and I work from my home office. I've been very mindful of keeping active because my work keeps me mostly glued to my screen all day. Every 50 minutes I take 10 minute breaks, and this little dumbbell set is a great way to do a couple of sets during those breaks. The set does have a slightly strong chemical smell, but after airing them out some its mostly gone. I compared a ton of dumbbell sets on Amazon, and settled for this one based on all the review I read. I made the right choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: TheDiegoAguirre

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive. Please read before buying.
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Deceptive ad though. Two sets of 30 lb barbells with a small bar. Does not add up to 40 lbs in any way. I was expecting 80 lbs, 40 lbs on each barbell. These are a lie. Not 40 lb set, two barbells with 15 lbs each. If there wasn't deceptive advertising, and it was $40 instead of $50, or had 10 more pounds on each, I would have given it a 4 or 5. I had to buy two sets.
customer_reviews.author: C. M.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what to expect with barbell weights
customer_reviews.text: Not much to complain about. All weights and pieces that was shown to come with it, was with it. Container it comes in is nice and heavy duty, still use our container for them, surprisingly the latches to close the container have yet to break which is impressive since its plastic
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product even better price
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive to order this based solely on price. How great could it be if it's this inexpensive, right? Well, I was wrong. The finish of the weights are well done and haven't chipped yet even though I'm rough on them. The screw downs stay tight. The bars are a little rough as it should be. You don't want them slipping out of your hands and onto your toes. I would but this again and recommend it to anyone wanting a starter dumbbell set.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Very nice item and I'm very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my father for Christmas and they arrived at my house on time and they were in perfect condition! It was packaged well, so they didn't break or fall out, and I'm really pleased with my purchase. I will add more to this review after Christmas when my father uses them. I think he's going to love it! And daughters/mothers, this is a great Christmas idea if you're thinking of buying something like this for your loved one. My father said this is what he really wants this year for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and store
customer_reviews.text: These are really great since they are easy to change out, but also have a nice storage container so they aren't just sitting out all disorganized and whatnot.
customer_reviews.author: Tiki108

customer_reviews.title: Well made, packaged, and does its job.
customer_reviews.text: The equipment is solid and easy to set up and use. The storage case seems very convenient, though I personally have no use for it. I recommend this dumbbell set as just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Clancy

customer_reviews.title: Great Overall, Minor Issues of Odor and Chipping Paint
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set, but has two issues. First, I wish that the manufacturer had not painted the weights black. Constantly adding and removing the weights, and adding and removing the locking mechanism has caused the paint to chip. The second issue is the smell. I bought this set months ago and still, every time I open the box, I am nearly overcome with a chemical sent. I advise those purchasing the set to open the box and let the weights sit outside (protected from the elements and theft, of course) for a week or so to see if the odor dissipates.
customer_reviews.author: Jen's Husband

customer_reviews.title: Great set, considering the cost
customer_reviews.text: Great set, considering the cost. Recommend purchasing a few additonal plates to make the set more complete. Right now, you can make both at most 20lbs, or a single up to 35lbs. Pick up some additional 10lb plates and you're golden. Even with the extra cost, this will still be a quality set for significantly cheaper than most other sets I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: WP

customer_reviews.title: 40 lbs or 32 lbs?
customer_reviews.text: According to the product information, this set contains two 5-pound handles, four 2.5-pound plates, and four 5-pound plates. I ordered and received the item and examined the contents. Everything is correct except for one thing - there is NO WAY the handles weigh 5 pounds each. I picked them up and they can't be more than 1 or 2 pounds each. I thought I might be mistaken, so I picked up one of the handles and one of my 5-pound dumbbells and my 5-pound dumbbell was heavier, no question. This set is NOT 40 pounds. More like 32-34 pounds. I will keep it and use it, but I'm kind of disappointed. I was hoping for heavier weights.
customer_reviews.author: relbeis

customer_reviews.title: Great for casual lifting
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty satisfied with this purchase. I did experience an odd, rubbery chemical smell when I first opened it, but this has long since dissipated. The adjustable features work well and are a no-brainer, even though the bar feels a little bit unpolished. It is easy to buy additional plates, almost any dumbbell sized plates should work. However, after adding more weights, I found that the stoppers on each end will move slightly with each curl when I'm doing arm curls, so I have to constantly re-tighten. Again, this only happened once I bought and used new weights. Durable construction, including the case, which has survived a move from Maryland to Massachusetts.
customer_reviews.author: A. Adadey

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: This weight set is perfect as long as you don't need more than 40lbs of weight per side. The bars are long so if you wanted to add more weights you can purchase them separately. The price is excellent for what you get. The storage box is nice just in case you want to take them on the road with you. The product arrived on my doorstep, and the outer box was pretty much destroyed however the weights were in a separate box and that box was untouched. No dent's or dings, no smell. They must have changed something since these really do not smell at all. They work great for what I wanted them for. Great price nice product!
customer_reviews.author: BINCA

customer_reviews.title: weigt just a minute here!
customer_reviews.text: looked good in the pics! the rubber between the weight/bar/locking nut are "mashed", and the case won't close & secure itself. after I managed to get one box out of a second box out of a third box and the packing straps removed, I'm left with a mess that doesn't warrant the headache associated with a return. they will work.
customer_reviews.author: fred

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set, downside is no spring collars for quick weight changes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set to start with and add weights. Used these with Body Beast which is good except doing supersets, ie back to back w no rest, is challenging trying to change weights quickly. However doing triceps workouts I feel confident holding these over my head instead of spring collars that often come off with negative resistance. These weights are well made and have a nice case that packs everything away neatly.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan W.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this, not as many weights as I expected. It says 40lbs weight set and for whatever reason I assumed that meant that I would have two dumbells would 40 lbs a piece if I needed that much. Nope. The set includes 40lbs total including the bars so the most each dumbell can weigh, if you're using both at one time is 20lbs. My fault really I guess, other than that Ive loved them. Easy to put together and put away the case is great to have, makes them super easy to move. Happy with it for sure, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kingpin

customer_reviews.title: Glue on the seals better please
customer_reviews.text: They’re great been using them up but the round rubber seals that keep the weights from getting loose all the time fall off and get lost and then you gotta tighten them after each and every set
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: spend more money
customer_reviews.text: The reason for such a low rating is the fact the collar that screws on the hold plates is horrible. It doesn't stay tight just making the dumbells untrustworthy and say.
customer_reviews.author: Nicci

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for the home when unable to get to the gym. Each dumbell adds 20 pounds since the bar is 5 pounds itself. Even though it isn't alot of weight, depending on the training as in a circuit, say 30 reps of hammer, reverse and forward grip curls will get the job done. The case is actually decent enough not heavy duty but works just fine and the weights a compact enough to fit in the corner and out of the way. Super happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat for the money
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Neat storage case to store them away when not using. I Keep them in our work out room - 40 lbs. is plenty of weight to strengthen, warm, stretch muscles I use for bow hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Traveling On

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: For the price I don't think you can do any better. We have a mini-gym at home, complete with bowflex, but my husband wanted to switch it up so I got him this set to see how he would like some free weights. He added them to his regime right away. In fact he's already added 20 more pounds to each dumbell by buying the separate plates by CAP sold here on amazon. I'm sure he'll be adding more. These are nothing fancy but they get the job done. Definitely invest in some weightlifting gloves though. The bar quickly irritated his hands but I think that's par for the course with heavy weights.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie J.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a beginner who doesn't want to invest a ...
customer_reviews.text: Update 3y later: the chrome finish has started chipping off the handles. And it's sharp. I've gotten several metal "splinters" from these. Not a good long term investment Great for a beginner who doesn't want to invest a ton of money, but still wants a quality product. It's also very compact. My fiance and I share a small apartment, and this doesn't get in the way at all.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter set
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for regarding weights. It's the same amount of weight I was using before because I'm still a novice. The carrying case is a nice bonus, but I don't need it much. It got a little scuffle during shipment but served its purpose. As for the smell, it was there. I opened and use my weights in my small room in a small apartment. The smell was there but faint. No need to be dramatic. It will be a while before I need more weights so this is a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Good Set, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today. At first I was a little puzzled at to where the other 10 lbs of weight was, but once I re-read up on the set I found that the handles were 5 lbs each. The other small plates I have fit perfectly and I like that I can adjust the bars as needed. It's a good set to help you grow in strength and tackle new exercises. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Good starter set, but a little smelly
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so first and foremost, this is not the sewage treatment plant that people make it out to be. Yes, there is a slight smell of oil/gasoline, but that comes from the fact that there is oil on the weights to prevent rust. However, the smell is not so bad that you have to use a mask when you use it. The case is sturdy, but one of the clamps that hold it together came broken, but not a big issue. Overall, its a good little set, but don't worry about those who would make these out to be the worst smelling thing of all time. Unless you have a VERY sensitive nose, you'll be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Jara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The carry case is great whether just for storage when not in use or to take on the road. Easy to change out weights. The collars are secure when holding the weights on the bar handle.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value pound per pound
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this. Takes up minimal space and comes in a hard shell casing. I have it literally in a corner. I wanted a few key components for a home gym and had a few kettle bells, yoga mat and ropes but did not want a mess or to get out of control. This is perfect. Heavy duty yet discreet if you are working with a small space such as an office, dorm room, or apartment and don't want much clutter.
customer_reviews.author: Ariaceliz

customer_reviews.title: Good weights
customer_reviews.text: This is your basic pair of dumbbells and weights. The weights seem to be very good quality. Would have given 5 stars but the design for the carrying case for the weights is defective. The case itself is very sturdy plastic but the clips to hold it closed are as cheap as they come and both were cracked upon arrival. For an extra 10 cents toward production costs, they could have an overall great product. If I needed the carrying case I would have returned the set. Fortunately I don't so recycled the case and kept the weights.
customer_reviews.author: S M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars for Dumbbell Set, Zero Stars for Amazon Packaging
customer_reviews.text: My review echoes what has been said before. The Dumbbell Set is excellent. The packaging job Amazon is doing for shipping this set needs a lot of improvement. When FedEx (used for the Free Super Saver Shipping btw) brought the package to my door I was just shocked at the condition the box was in, it looked like it has been to war and back. Aside from the very poor packaging this set is excellent. I was tempted to splurge and buy thebut I couldn't bring myself to paying that much just on dumbbells, the money is just not there for those at the moment. The Cap Dumbbell set is good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good for home and  road trips
customer_reviews.text: I got this primarily to carry in my car on road trips. I have shoulder and back problems, and must exercise with dumbbells at least once a week. The set is easily transported. I find that I am using it most of the time at home, too. There was no damage to the case during shipping, and no smell when I unpacked it. I highly recommend this set for anyone who needs only relatively light dumbbells. I'm 70 years old, BTW. (added) To make the barbells easier to take from the car into a motel room, I got this foldable hand cart
customer_reviews.author: Jan Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for some dumbbells for my son for a long time. He's a distance runner and wants to gain more upper body muscle, but not bulk up. I was eyeing up the Blowflex brand for a longtime. These went on an Amazon Lightning deal and I jumped on them. Several people have reviewed these and overall it’s been positive. I thought we need more weight, but he didn't. He uses one at a time when he needs more weight. You can also purchase more Cap weights online if needed. The case is also great for storage if needed. I highly recommend this dumbbell set.
customer_reviews.author: Goby

customer_reviews.title: It's an alright set if you're just looking to get by
customer_reviews.text: I like this dumbbell set and use it daily but I hate that I have to make sure they are locked in place with each use. You really don't get that 20 pound option for each but you can have one up to 20 pounds. Like the case it comes in to store any weights I'm not using. The smell isn't as bad as others made it out to be. Just let it air out a bit before you use it. It's an alright set if you're just looking to get by.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie B

customer_reviews.title: Decent free weight set
customer_reviews.text: The reviews about the smell are weird...I don't smell gasoline, I smell normal grease for adjustable hand weights and it's not overpowering (those who find it so probably have a smell sensitivity). I really liked that it came in a case (makes it easy for storing and moving). I only gave it four stars, because one of the fasteners gets a little use just about every time we use them, but not so bad that it's dangerous or anything. Very easy to adjust. I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Good catch on sale
customer_reviews.text: This was a great little set for the money. They come in a nice plastic case that you can easily put them back into after using them if you want to. The handles are pretty comfortable, and the weights seem solid. Even my wife could comfortably hold them. These are a great alternative if you are looking for an adjustable range of power weights.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian C.

customer_reviews.title: Decent dumbbell set.
customer_reviews.text: Very decent dumbbell set. I didn't notice any funny odor either. Changing the weights on the dumbbells is a little time-consuming; screwing the collars on and off is annoying but i don't mind much for the price point. I use these little guys for mostly arms/shoulder isolation stuff while I watch TV; three sets of lateral raises during commercials. I store dumbbells in the open case so they don't roll away between uses. The set is quite nice for home use and packs away neatly for "Resolutioners".
customer_reviews.author: Tiana C.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile set but is not truly 40 pounds and has carcinogens.
customer_reviews.text: The 5 pound bar is slightly lighter than the 5 pound barbell so the description of this item was not entirely accurate. However, the overall set is a great price and value for the money but I wished the company would make the barbell heavily so that it is actually 5 pounds. Another major issue is the chemicals used in the production of this set. The set has a strong odor and the label mentions that the set contains chemicals known to cause cancer.
customer_reviews.author: John Homar

customer_reviews.title: Handles are smaller in diameter than most dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with the quality. They are what I expected. I bought some additional 10lb plates to increase my maximum weight per dumbbell to over 60lbs. One issue for me is that the handles are smaller in diameter than most dumbbells I've used. I have larger hands and the smaller diameter handles create some discomfort with heavier weights (> 40lbs on a single dumbbell).
customer_reviews.author: T.M.M.

customer_reviews.title: There seems to be quality control issues
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set because the price was right and my brother has the same one and I liked them. Mine, however, came in worse shape than his. The weights sit crooked in the case because the plastic is bent in several locations and the total weight is only 37 lbs not 40. The crooked weights make lining up the case a little difficult when closing and getting less weight than advertised makes me feel ripped off. None of that is really a deal breaker but I reserve 4 and 5 stars for products that deliver what they advertise so 3 stars it is.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good price and value for general use.
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a well made package and good value for what you get. The only issue we had was getting service to send the right rubber 'O'-rings that keep the collars tight and remove the rattling. A couple of the original O rings got crushed as the way they were packaged and shipped. Unfortunately for me, I got a little over worked in some deep chest exercises and messed up my back for months. So they get put away for someone else to use. But my fault not theirs.
customer_reviews.author: TheTechGuy

customer_reviews.title: Shipped fast but doesn't come with the nuts that go ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast but doesn't come with the nuts that go on the bar to hold weights on as advertised. Comes with these bs rubber o rings that just fall off and weights hit the floor if ur not paying attention.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Weights
customer_reviews.text: The supplement equipment I was looking for! I have a small home gym and this set is a perfect supplement to my Bowflex adjustable weights. When you initially receive it, you will notice a very strong odor coming from it. This is the oil they use while storing the weights. I used some vinegar to wipe it off and let them dry for a few days outside the house. A week later the smell had diminished. I am very pleased with these weights and strongly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: A good set for the price
customer_reviews.text: This set is great. Mine arrived on time. No odor, in perfect condition. Case is strong. I must say that I did not give this set a lot of use so I don't know how it would hold up over time. I had to send mine back. There was nothing wrong with the set, I just learned that this type of equipment is not what I want.
customer_reviews.author: luciellenc

customer_reviews.title: really great
customer_reviews.text: u can only get 35lbs off of one since the handle is 5lbs. but 35 is a pretty good amount to curl, and 20lbs each is plenty for most women and for beginners/ or for simple muscle maintaince. it doesnt smell like some people say, its a weight i dont kno what can be wrong with a weight unless it is a safety risk... pretty hard to mess up a curling weight haha. i want to get maybe 10lbs more on each side, but havent been able to so far.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband as a gift because he's been hassling me about getting in shape. I figured these were cheaper than a gym membership! He seems to like them and they don't take up a lot of room, which is a major plus when you have a small apartment and your toddler leaves his toys everywhere. My only complaint is the smell - it was VERY strong and bad smelling. However, the smell seems to have gone away after being aired out. Overall, these are a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Tawnie

customer_reviews.title: Corona virus workout savers
customer_reviews.text: Got these because they are on sale but with this COVID 19 this is the best!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Falcon

customer_reviews.title: Grade A, Number 1 Product
customer_reviews.text: This has truly turned out to be an excellent purchase for me. The weight system here is outstanding. Quality weight discs with screw down hubs with rubber washers that forbid any movement while in use. No shaking and no wobbling. What more can I say? I took a chance and my gamble paid off. Just exactly what I needed and of course, excellent Amazon service, delivery time, packaging and pricing. Thanks again Amazon, you hit another one out of the park. I strongly recommend this item to anyone who is need of it. Best regards, Tony
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J. Tarquinio

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE screw-on "clamps"
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE screw-on "clamps". These dumbbells feel great in the hand, too. The "carrying case" is a joke. It's incredibly thin and flimsy. Who would carry these bad-boys anywhere? I believe the case is for shipping purposes only. The dumbbells are high quality and I really like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Bronx Brenda NYC

customer_reviews.title: Good set.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it is in lbs and you can add in 2.5 or 5 or 10 lb increments because the bar and hardware is 5 lbs. Some of the other sets are in kg with 4 lb bar and hardware so trying to do lbs gets awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Larry H

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of dumbells
customer_reviews.text: These are a great pair of dumbbells for the money. They weigh twenty pounds per dumbbells, and are easily adjustable. I did notice a burr on the end of one of the dumbbells, therefore you may want to be careful when you first start using them. If you're looking for a great basic pair of dumbbells, these are a good choice. They come in a nice solid plastic case that can be used to store and move them, also.
customer_reviews.author: Super ManTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Initial terrible smell
customer_reviews.text: The weights themselves are fine, but like other reviewers have noted initially there was a strong chemical smell that actually took months to go away. Another problem was that when I used other weights in conjunction, the other weights would start to smell as well. Because of the smell I basically stored these outside and now some of the plates are starting to show rust. Overall depending on the price and free delivery that amazon offers, this can be a decent deal. Just know there seems to be a risk of this annoying odor that can take awhile to go away.
customer_reviews.author: SDNY

customer_reviews.title: Nice set but not 40 pounds
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to supplement my fixed-weight dumbbells so I could add smaller weight increments to my routine. It does have a slight chemical smell when first opened, as other reviewers have stated, but it dissipated after a week. My biggest complaint is that the set is not actually 40 pounds but 36.6 pounds as measured on my digital bathroom scale. The plates are the correct weights, but the bars are 3.3 pounds each. Other than that, the set seems to be of a good quality, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: FYB

customer_reviews.title: High quality trim
customer_reviews.text: Was not expecting such good chrome and finish on these and just all around good quality. Especially for such a good price. Easy to pick up other 1" cewnter hole weights to add to these if needed. bravo!
customer_reviews.author: Bernie stagehill

customer_reviews.title: Really well made, plus free shipping
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made cast iron dumbbell set, plus with amazon.com you get free shipping (a thirty dollar savings). The set arrived in great shape, no damage. I also did not notice any odor or smell about them. The weights do not make any sound when in use; rubber spacers prevent this. If you want to expand the set, extra weights are very easy to find, plus the threaded portions of the bars/handles are ample enough to hold a total of 4 weights on each side, with plenty of room still left for the locking collars.
customer_reviews.author: Ancient Coin

customer_reviews.title: Works for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: work for my needs! I'm trying to build muscle. I'm on the thinner side- 5'8" 120lbs. Been a dancer my whole life and recently started martial arts so I'm more lean and thin. Trying to gain muscle weight, so for what I can life- this is good for me. The best part is that they all fit inside the trunk it comes in. Saves space and you can combine weights to give yourself variations.
customer_reviews.author: KPot

customer_reviews.title: Real smooth screw action on these bad boys
customer_reviews.text: Weights have nice smooth finish. The handles seem good so far. The threads all seem good, everything screws on very smoothly. I was expecting to have to battle with it eventually to get the collars on and off, but its been nice so far.
customer_reviews.author: Cornelius B. Willingston

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son for Christmas and he absolutely loves them. They are well made and look good. He likes the case that they came in so he can keep everything together and take them with him when he wants to. This was a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

product_meta.title: CAP Barbell Adjustable Dumbbell Set, 40 to 200 Pounds
feature_bullets: What’s included 40 pound set includes 2 handles, 4 2.5 pound plates, 4 5 pound plates, 4 collars, and a plastic storage/carrying case
Construction durable cast iron plates have a semi-gloss finish offers a rust and maintenance free product; Dumbbell handles are made from solid steel
FEATURES: Set features ergonomic grips, comfortable handles, and rubber trimmed collars; Collars are threaded for a secure fit to handles
VERSATILE: Dumbbells offer the ability to target specific muscle groups or get a full body workout
FUNCTIONAL: Perfect for isolations, full body, functional, and HIIT workouts
TRUST: Trust experience; CAP has been a pioneer in the fitness industry for over 30 years and has locations worldwide; Chances are, if you have ever worked out before you have used a CAP product

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
